name: Ahmed Hussain Qureshi
content: Ahmed Qureshi - Department of Computer Science - Purdue University Skip to content Home People Faculty Ahmed Qureshi Faculty & Lecturers Staff Offices Ahmed Qureshi Assistant Professor of Computer Science Our team is dedicated to advancing the field of robot planning and control through a combination of fundamental and applied research. Our primary objective is to develop robots that can operate effectively and safely in natural and dynamic human environments. To achieve this, we focus on a range of challenges, such as scalable and fast motion planning, active perception, human-in-the-loop robot manipulation, mobile navigation, and dynamic control. The ultiâ¦ âMore Joined department: Fall 2021 Research Areas Robotics and Computer Vision Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Natural Language Processing Education Ph.D., University of California San Diego, Intelligent Systems, Robotics and Control (2021) M.S., Osaka University, Robotics (2017) B.S., National University of Science and Technology, Electrical Engineering (2014) Our team is dedicated to advancing the field of robot planning and control through a combination of fundamental and applied research. Our primary objective is to develop robots that can operate effectively and safely in natural and dynamic human environments. To achieve this, we focus on a range of challenges, such as scalable and fast motion planning, active perception, human-in-the-loop robot manipulation, mobile navigation, and dynamic control. The ultimate goal of our research is to enhance peopleâs lives and optimize workforce efficiency in various economic and healthcare sectors. Selected Publications Ruiqi Ni and Ahmed H.
